title: Where Winds Meet December's calendar is full of new content, including a new region and the mobile launch you've been waiting for
contents: Where Winds Meet already has a staggering amount of content, but that’s not the end of what we can expect. Developer Everstone Studio just revealed a host of new additions coming to the game this month. Read more

title: Recent Updates and Optimizations
contents: Dear Wanderers:Since last weekend, you likely have explored the vibrant life of Kaifeng. Whether you stumbled upon exciting encounters or are still enjoying the main chapter, we hope your journey has been enjoyable. We understand that there may have been some bumps along the way, and we've gathered your feedback to address your concerns. Rest assured, we're actively working on improvements to enhance your experience!Audio IssuesBug Fixes:1. Fixed incorrect voice lines in the Jianghu Journey CG.2. Fixed the issue of missing music during the cutscene: Reforging Coins.3. Fixed audio-visual sync issues in some scenes.4. The issue of missing sound issue on Consoles will be addressed gradually this week.We've released a new batch of dubbing and are addressing audio-visual sync issues. Expect more dubbing and voice fixes to be available this week!Upcoming UI Optimizations:1. Dialogue: Subtitle optimization by fixing text overflow and adjusting the font size.2. Text in the open-world: optimizes text display to avoid too much text from appearing at once.3. Kaifeng Tour Map interface: Localizes into multiple languages.4. Healer interface: optimizes layout and display.5. Equipment Tuning interface: Fixes text overflow and optimizes the localization for the musical notes: Gong, Shang, Jue, Zhi, and Yu.The UI optimizations above are expected to be implemented on January 9 with the V1.2 update. In the meantime, we've received feedback about the menu being too complicated and difficult to navigate. We're also working on these improvements and hope to roll them out soon.Words from the DevsWe deeply appreciate the love and support from you wanderers around the world. Every piece of feedback matters and helps make our shared Jianghu better. Continue to engage with us through the online community, customer service, and other channels. We will always be here to address your concerns.If you encounter any issues during your journey, please don't hesitate to share your feedback through the following channels:· In-game Customer Service· Official community: Where Winds Meet official account· Customer service email: wherewindsmeet@global.netease.comFeedback format:Character ID (found in the lower left corner):Time of the issue:Scene:Details:Screenshot or video recording:

title: Bug Fixed Announcement 11/28
contents: Dear Wanderers:Thank you for your support of Where Winds Meet. We truly value your feedback and enthusiasm for the game.Fixed the issue that the Healer's Chest was invisible in the wardrobe.Fixed the issue with the PS5 microphone not turning off properly.Fixed the issue that the PS5 "Quick on the Uptake" trophy could not be obtained correctly.Fixed issues with missed or misplaced dubbing in Campaigns and Jianghu Legacy quests.Fixed issues with tasks in Lumina Guide: Kaifeng.Fixed abnormal sound effects with the Lift.Fixed the issue that some NPCs where some NPCs disappeared and Anecdote quests cannot be completed.Fixed incorrect currency display for some gameplays.Fixed clipping issues with the Verdant Feathers shoes.Optimized the PS5 survey experience. You can now scan the QR code to access and complete the survey.Optimized the Acupoint Strike text display by increasing the font size and adding a floating effect.Optimized certain requirements for completing Exploration Manual.Added a DLSS4 Multi Frame Generation option. Enable it in settings if you're using an RTX 50 series graphics card.New item "Mystic Skills Breakthrough Support Box" now arrives in the Season Shop.The addition of a "goose" character indicates combat capability.We will continue to prioritize the issues you’ve reported and resolve them promptly to enhance your experience.

title: Where Winds Meet devs plan improved Steam Deck support
contents: Where Winds Meet continues to be a big hit on Steam and it works quite well on Desktop Linux but it needs a lot of improvements on Valve's Steam Deck. Read the full article here: https://www.gamingonlinux.com/2025/11/where-winds-meet-devs-plan-improved-steam-deck-support/

title: Vote to Nominate Where Winds Meet for the Steam Awards!
contents: Dear Wanderers,If you've followed the winds and embraced the vibrant life of Jianghu, now's your chance to share its amazing tales with the world! Cast your vote and let everyone know about Jianghu! Vote to Nominate Where Winds Meet for the Steam Awards:https://store.steampowered.com/steamawards/nominations/2025• GAME OF THE YEAR The immersive and one-of-a-kind Jianghu. Explore a vibrant, living wuxia open world, where every corner of the land holds surprises!• BEST GAME YOU SUCK AT Love beyond defeat. Mid blade and shadow, you may fall and rise again—yet that spark of chivalry in your heart never fades.• OUTSTANDING STORY-RICH GAMEChoices that resonate. Each decision ties your fate to the joys and sorrows of those who roam this vast Jianghu.• OUTSTANDING VISUAL STYLELiving Landscape and the art that breathes. Every frame is a living scroll of Chinese aesthetics, where mountains, water, and wind move with a life of their own. Your vote will help this seed of Where Winds Meet take root on a broader global stage, bringing the beauty of the wuxia open world to players everywhere.

title: Hearts unite as the winds meet
contents: It has always been thrilling for us to see you leave the bamboo abode and embark on your journey into the world of Jianghu in Where Winds Meet. Just like your first encounter with Jianghu, our initial attempt to connect with players around the globe has been both exciting and uncertain. But our passion and commitment to creating a living open world drive us forward, and your response and support to our efforts has been a tremendous encouragement, giving us the confidence to keep pushing ahead.Since launch, we have been listening closely. Your feedback, suggestions, frustrations, and encouragement have all been taken to heart, and we are actively addressing any areas where the experience has fallen short. While there is still much work to be done, we kindly ask for your patience as we continue to develop this world together with you.Actions speak louder than words. To address the current issues affecting your experience, our development team is working tirelessly to optimize these concerns. Here are the initial progress we have made: For network connectivity, we've fixed the routing issue that caused some players in Europe, the Middle East, and certain regions to be connected to non-local servers, resulting in high latency. We will continue to monitor post-fix data and player reports to ensure optimal performance.The issue of high network latency in Online mode has been resolved, and the issue in Solo mode is expected to be fixed in the mid-December update.Regarding text localization and voiceovers, we've revised many translations to make them more idiomatic and easier to understand. Additionally, we've optimized dubbing and subtitles in various story quests. We will continue to refine the localization of the game to make the Jianghu more immersive.In terms of the interface, we've improved the beginner tutorial, enhanced character customization, and refined English clues for puzzle-solving quests.These are just some examples of the key optimizations. For more details on fixes and improvements, please stay tuned for our official announcements.Looking ahead, we're committed to ongoing improvements in other key issues that concern you most including text localization, PS5 compatibility, and multi-character creation features.Optimizing multilingual localization is a continuous effort, and we’ve received many impressive translation suggestions through our open channels. We plan to launch co-creation events in the future, allowing your voice to shape the world of Where Winds Meet.For the PS5 platform, we’re working hard to enhance frame rates, stability, and visual quality. You can expect to see these gameplay improvements within the year.Regarding multi-character creation, we’re addressing platform restrictions and actively seeking solutions to meet your expectations.Over the next two months, we will gradually roll out several updates, including Steam Deck compatibility, optimized multi-timezone display, split outfit customization, PS5 Pro support for PSSR, enhanced audio experience, and more. Our goal is to create a Jianghu that everyone can enjoy, and we welcome any further suggestions you may have.Your support keeps us moving forward on this exciting journey that is just beginning. Thank you once again for supporting Where Winds Meet, we will not let you down!

title: Miles Apart, Close at Heart
contents: Dear Wanderers,Miles apart, yet always close at heart.We want to make this promise to you, as we approach our one-week release milestone. You, our players, are at the center of everything we do, and we want to make sure that you always feel heard and valued. We can be miles apart, but we'll always be close at heart.The global release has brought us both excitement and challenges. We are listening closely and gathering feedback on all aspects of events and gameplay. Your voice matters to us, and we truly value your input.We value fairness above all else. Your experiences are at the heart of our design for all content and events. Our goal is simple: to make Jianghu a more welcoming place for everyone.We promise that every suggestion you make will be carefully considered. The team will continue to optimize this world of Jianghu that belongs to all of us.Regarding the Event: Swords Unseen, we will be adding additional rewards after today's patch update—you can go to the event page and claim them.As a small token of our gratitude, we have also prepared a special gift for you: Lingering Melody ×10.Meeting you has felt like greeting an old friend from across the winds. Our journey together is only beginning, and it is our honor to walk it with you.Thank you—each and every one of you—for giving life and meaning to this world.Where Winds Meet Team

title: Where Winds Meet (PS5) Review
contents: Where Winds Meet definitely caught me by surprise. When I first saw its debut trailer at Gamescom ONL 2022, I assumed it was some kind of new kind of high-action Soulslike with a martial arts setting. And due to the nature of my job and how many games I need to keep track of on a daily basis, I kind of put it in the mind-vault and kind of forgot about it. So imagine my amazement when I finally got my hands on it and it turned out to be more of an action MMO. It’s the second time this year that I’ve played a game like this—the first being a brief hands-on with Chrono Odyssey—and twice now that I’ve been amazed by how far the genre has come. Where Winds Meet isn’t exactly flawless, but it lays the groundwork for a truly engrossing experience that’s big on style. Set during China’s Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, Where Winds Meet places players in a high-fantasy version of the region of Qinghe. Players take on the role of a wandering swordsperson who embarks on... Read more

title: Bug Fixed Announcement 11/18
contents: Dear Wanderers:Thank you for your support of Where Winds Meet. We truly value your feedback and enthusiasm for the game.The Eastwind Pavilion has addressed several issues and optimized certain features:- Fixed the issue where outfits weren’t displaying correctly during cutscenes.- Fixed the issue of wrong red dot notifications in the Season feature.- Fixed the issue in Five Animal Frolics.- Fixed the stats error for Sword Morph.- Fixed the issue with the friend search function not working.- Fixed the issue with Signpost button display.- Fixed the issue with the recommended contacts list not refreshing.- Optimized some text translations.- Optimized some voiceovers.Scheduled Updates AheadWe're aware of reports of high ping issues.Our investigation found that parts of the EU and MENA regions were being incorrectly routed to the wrong server.We will deploy multiplayer network optimization on Nov 21 (UTC+8) to ensure affected players are reconnected to their proper regional servers.Additionally, the latency issues impacting single-player mode in these regions will be resolved in a mid-December patch.We’ll continue to monitor performance closely. Thank you for your patience and support.We will continue to prioritize the issues you’ve reported and resolve them promptly to enhance your experience.Eastwind Pavilion

title: The big new RPG Where Winds Meet release works well on Linux
contents: Where Winds Meet is a new free to play game on Steam that's doing some big numbers right now, and thankfully it seems to work great on Linux with Proton. Read the full article here: https://www.gamingonlinux.com/2025/11/the-big-new-where-winds-meet-release-works-well-on-linux/

title: Bug Fixed Announcement 11/17
contents: Dear Wanderers:Thank you for your support of Where Winds Meet. We truly value your feedback and enthusiasm for the game.The Eastwind Pavilion has addressed several issues and optimized certain features:- Fixed incorrect voice lines for the protagonist in some scenes- Fixed the issue of the menu being unclickable.- Fixed the TikTok link in the "Ties that Bind" event.- Fixed the the navigation issues for appearances in the Wardrobe.- Fixed improper line breaks in certain languages.- Fixed the issue where outfits weren’t displaying correctly during cutscenes.- Optimized in-game localizations.We will continue to prioritize the issues you’ve reported and resolve them promptly to enhance your experience. See you in Kaifeng!Eastwind Pavilion

title: Bug Fixed Announcement 11/16
contents: Dear Wanderers:Thank you for your support of Where Winds Meet. We truly value your feedback and enthusiasm for the game.- The custom emotes feature will be temporarily disabled while we optimize the review mechanism. By doing so, we aim to ensure a healthy communication environment.- Fixed the issue where signposts in Solo Mode automatically played recordings.-Temporarily disabled the Signpost voice recording and auto-translation; which will be relaunched after further optimization.- Fixed the issue where Customization and Makeup might not load properly.- Optimized task descriptions of the Wanderers Alike event.- Optimized tips for the Perception Forest.- Optimized translations across various texts.We will continue to prioritize the issues you’ve reported and resolve them promptly to enhance your experience. See you in Kaifeng!Eastwind Pavilion

title: Bug Fixed Announcement 11/15
contents: Legends,​​The East Wind Mansion has resolved the following issue：Fixed an issue where some "Old Friends" cannot make friends.Fixed an issue where the PlayStation controller D-pad could not switch weapons.Fixed an issue with abnormal interaction buttons on road signs.Fixed an issue with abnormal gaps in storyline subtitles.Optimized the process for some Rangers entering target servers to reduce game latency.Improved in-game performance issues on the Steam platform.We are committed to closely monitoring any game bugs and will ensure prompt fixes. Thank you for your continued support! *For any game issues, please reach out to us at wherewindsmeet@global.netease.com. You can also provide feedback to us through the in-game customer service center. To assist us in investigating the issue more effectively, we kindly request that you include your game ID, a description of the problem, and any screenshots you may have. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated.

title: Where Winds Meet peaks at 251k players
contents: Where Winds Meet has peaked at 251,008 concurrent players on 23 November 2025 just 8 days after release. View charts and more statistics on our website.

title: Where Winds Meet Global Launch On Nov 14 at 10 PM UTC
contents: Jianghu speaks of danger and romance—of wandering heroes, honor, and fate intertwined. On Nov 14 at 10 PM UTC, your journey begins. Download Now:

title: Where Winds Meet is Set to Launch on November 14th, 2025
contents: We are thrilled to announce that WhereWinds Meet launches globally on November 14th, 2025 on PC and PlayStation 5. Set during the turbulent era of tenth-century China, you take on the role of a young sword master, uncovering forgotten truths and the mysteries of your own identity. As the wind stirs across mountains and rivers, so too will your legend rise.Forge your legend in the wuxia worldExplore an immersive wuxia open-world inspired by ancient martial arts fantacyExperience combat that flows like true martial artistryOur vision is to create a world of pure freedom, where you can live the dream of Jianghu in your own way— without limits, without barriers. You can embark on a rich, narrative driven single player adventure with over 150 hours of gameply, open your world to up to 4 friends in seamless co-op, or step into a shared, ever-evolving world with thousands of fellow adventurers.We can't wait to share this world with you. Mark your calendars! Your story begins November 14, 2025.For more information, visit the game’s official website:https://www.wherewindsmeetgame.com/Follow our socials to learn more: X|Facebook|Instagram|Youtube|Discord

title: The Final Test Begins!
contents: Peep-peep! Hello Legends, Thank you for your enthusiasm and support! The Final Test is officially live now! \ This is a limited, free-to-play, closed beta available on PC and PlayStation. The current game is still in the development and refinement stage, and the test content does not represent the final quality of the game. \ Beijing: July 25 10:00 to Aug 1 12:00（UTC+8） New York: July 24 at 22:00 p.m. ET to Aug 1 at 00:00 a.m. ET Tokyo: July 25 11:00 (JST) to Aug 1 13:00 (JST) Seoul: July 25 11:00 (KST) to Aug 1 13:00 (KST) \ PC: Redeem your steam beta code and download the game. \ Open World: All Qinghe region and most areas of Kaifeng region (including related Fragment Chapters and Campaigns). Main Story: Till the first half of Chapter 2. Modes: Solo Mode, Co-op Mode & Online Mode. \ To ensure a smooth testing experience, please note: 1. Test access is strictly personal and non-transferable. Any form of trading or transferring test qualifications is prohibited. For any violation detected, we reserve the right to revoke access and take further action. Please beware of any unauthorized sale or sharing of test accounts or installation files to avoid losses. Thank you for your understanding. 2. Test qualifications are tied exclusively to your registered platform and device; platform switching is not supported during the closed beta. 3. The use of cheats, hacks, or any third-party tools that compromise game fairness is strictly forbidden. Violations may result in penalties including removal of illicit gains, account suspension, or bans. 4. Please avoid firmware updates or system reinstalls on your test device during the closed beta. 5. Controller support is available, but some menus and gameplay features may not be fully optimized for it yet. If you encounter unresponsive controls, please switch to keyboard and mouse. We appreciate your patience. \For test-related FAQs, please visit our official website: www.wherewindsmeet.com If you have any question or suggestion, please reach out via in-game Feedback button or join our official Discord group. Where Winds Meet Team
